column5: Hey all.  I keep hearing/seeing/reading about people looking for a Ci4 and I found one but not sure if it's a good deal. http://toronto.kijiji.ca/c-buy-and-sell-sports-bikes-SHIMANO-CI4-MODEL-2500-SPINNING-REEL-W0QQAdIdZ286985916  I'm not looking for one myself at this time so this is just to let you know for those looking.  No, it's not my ad either.
good deal for sure if I lived down that way I would buy it myself
I tried the 2500 series reel with 20lb sufix 832, I was really impressed with it. That is a good price, I like the Foam handle on the reel, I think it is better than the T shape handle.
That is a great price, they retail for over $200. I have one, it's handled everything from smallies to redfish and is still going strong.
